    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Elektrina v homogenem magnetnem polju</string>
            <string language="en">Charge in a uniform magnetic field</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ladung in einem konstanten magnetischem 
fangen auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Charge dans un champ magnétique uniforme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Carga em um campo magnético uniforme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Carica in un campo magnetico dell'uniforme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δαπάνη σε ένα ομοιόμορφο μαγνητικό πεδίο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Carga en un campo magnético uniforme</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Sile na električni naboj v magnetnem polju in parametri od katerih je odvisna ta sila.</string>
            <string language="en">Forces acting on electric charge in uniform magnetic field and parameters that define these forces.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">magnetno polje</string>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električni naboj</string>
            <string language="en">electric charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">elektrika</string>
            <string language="en">electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kräfte, die auf elektrischer Ladung in 
konstantem magnetischem fungieren, fangen und Parameter auf, 
die diese Kräfte definieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forces agissant sur la charge électrique dans le 
champ magnétique et les paramètres uniformes qui définissent ces 
forces.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Forças que agem na carga elétrica no campo 
magnético e nos parâmetros uniformes que definem estas forças.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forze che si comportano sulla carica elettrica nel
campo magnetico e nei parametri dell'uniforme che definiscono 
queste forze.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δυνάμεις που ενεργούν στην ηλεκτρική δαπάνη στο 
ομοιόμορφες μαγνητικό πεδίο και τις παραμέτρους που καθορίζουν 
αυτές τις δυνάμεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerzas que actúan en carga eléctrica en campo 
magnético uniforme y los parámetros que definen estas fuerzas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Ladung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrizität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'électricité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">carga elétrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">eletricidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">carica elettrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρική δαπάνη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
